document.full_text: michael sarrazin, best known for starring opposite jane fonda in 1969's "they shoot horses, don't they?," has died in montreal after a brief battle with cancer. he was 70.
document.title: "horses".' star michael sarrazin dies at 70
lines_and_colors: michael sarrazin, best known for starring opposite jane fonda in 1969's "they shoot horses, don't they?," has died in montreal after a brief battle with cancer. he was 70.
